original: Larsson, Erik, civilingenjör, Göteborg, f. 9/9/98 i Hälsingborg. G. 27 m. Ingeborg Torjusen. Barn: Tordis-Karin f. 28, Karl-Thomas 30, Eva Margareta 38, Inga 40. — Utex. fr. CTH 21. Anst. v. Fredriksstads Mek. Verkst. 22-23, Blyth Shipbuilding & Dry Dock Co. i Engl. 24, Eriksbergs Mek. Verkst. i Gbg 25-27, Götaverken 27-38, därefter v. A-B Lindholmens Varv, verkst. dir. i bolaget sed. 42. RNS:tOO.
translated: Larsson, Erik, engineer, Gothenburg, b. 9/9/1898 in Helsingborg. Married on 27, (year unknown) to Ingeborg Torjusen. Children: Tordis-Karin b. 28, Karl-Thomas b. 30, Eva Margareta b. 38, Inga b. 40. Graduated from Chalmers University of Technology in 1921. Employed at Fredriksstads Mekaniske Verksted from 1922-1923, Blyth Shipbuilding & Dry Dock Co. in England in 1924, Eriksbergs Mekaniska Verkstad in Gothenburg from 1925-1927, Götaverken from 1927-1938, and subsequently at A-B Lindholmens Varv, serving as the company's director since 1942. Member of the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences since unknown year.
